page.title: 13Employment
page.content:
The School of motoring have a few cars.We have two postmen here. There are many farmers in Cribyn and people who help on the farms.
A stone mason works to rebuild old buildings. There is a carpenter and a plumber named Wyn Thomas.The electrician is Mr Davies.Someone works for the Water Board.
The Post Office is run by Mr and Mrs Jones.There is an office worker named Mr Hulley who works in England.Miss Lloyd works for the Milk Marketing Board in Felin Fach.There are three teachers who work in other areas.
Mr Cash runs the garage.We have two actors named Dennis and Euros. Dennis is sometimes on TV.
